alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A gusty outflow boundary will impact portions of northeastern Dickenson, Buchanan, northern McDowell, southeastern Mingo, southwestern Raleigh and Wyoming Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 956 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty outflow boundary, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Welch, Grundy, Pineville, Breaks Interstate, Mullens, Oceana, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Gilbert Creek, Coal City, Twin Falls State Park, Big Rock, Paw Paw, Gilbert, Davy, Bradshaw, Iaeger, Kimball, Rhodell and Coal Mountain. This includes West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 30 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
